1 - everything NextBip of end of while loop
stmt s;
Select s such that NextBip(6, s)
3
5000
2 - NextBip of condition of if statement
stmt s;
Select s such that NextBip(7, s)
8, 10
5000
3 - NextBip of condition of while loop
stmt s;
Select s such that NextBip(3, s)
4, 7
5000
4 - NextBip of else of if statement
stmt s;
Select s such that NextBip(9, s)
24
5000
5 - NextBip of then of if statement
stmt s;
Select s such that NextBip(8, s)
9
5000
6 - NextBip of statement list within while loop
stmt s;
Select s such that NextBip(4, s)
5
5000
7 - NextBip of statement list within if statement
stmt s;
Select s such that NextBip(16, s)
17, 18
5000
8 - boolean with two wild cards

Select BOOLEAN such that NextBip(_, _)
TRUE
5000
9 - reflexivity with while statement
stmt s;
Select s such that NextBip(s, s)

5000
10 - reflexivity with any other statement (invalid)
assign s;
Select s such that NextBip(s, s)

5000
11 - NextBip of a call statement (NextBip statement, not across procs)
stmt s;
Select s such that NextBip(5, s)
21
5000
12 - all statements that come NextBip of something
stmt s;
Select s such that NextBip(_, s)

13 - all statements that have something NextBip
stmt s;
Select s such that NextBip(s, _)

14 - everything NextBip of an assign statement

20 - boolean with true condition

FALSE

64 - NextBip(_, x) for stmt
stmt s;
Select s such that NextBip(_,s)

65 - NextBip(_, x) for progline

83 - NextBip tuple
stmt s1, s2;
